description: The Jint transformation engine fails to meet performance requirements (10MB JSON in <10s) under load, causing widespread job timeouts.
mitigation_strategy: Implement automated performance benchmark test (REQ-PERF-DTR-002) in CI/CD pipeline and profile engine under heavy load early in Sprint 1.
contingency_plan: Scope future enhancement for a streaming-based transformation engine if benchmarks cannot be met.
monitoring_trigger: Automated performance test fails consistently; Prometheus metrics show high P95 latency.

description: A malicious script bypasses the Jint sandbox constraints, allowing access to the host's CLR, file system, or network, leading to a critical security breach.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory formal security review of sandbox implementation. Enforce strict, non-configurable security options (no CLR access).
contingency_plan: Immediately disable the entire Data Transformation feature via the system-wide feature flag (REQ-OPER-IMP-001) and release a security patch.
monitoring_trigger: Security audit logs show a sandbox violation; Penetration testing reveals a sandbox escape vector.
resolution_timeline: 24 hours to disable via feature flag.

description: The visual diff component for script versioning performs poorly with large scripts, leading to browser freezes and a frustrating user experience.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate time for a technical spike in Sprint 2 to evaluate multiple diff libraries (e.g., Monaco Diff Editor vs. react-diff-viewer) for performance.
contingency_plan: Replace the side-by-side visual diff with a simpler 'view-only' modal for each version, deferring the visual diff feature.
monitoring_trigger: QA testing shows browser unresponsive for >5 seconds with scripts >100KB.
